Html:

What part didn't you understand?

The full installation instructions, or more simply put, the locations where you have to put the files, can be found at https://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Styles&referringTitle=Documentation&ANCHOR#Installation

Dear Yves
I do that but it doesn't work; please let me know if I do something aditonal
Thanks for your attention
Francisco
